flavorText: You can't remember a time when you didn't feel the pull of forgotten stories and buried secrets.

foreignData.flavorText: Seit du dich erinnern kannst, fühlst du dich zu vergessenen Geschichten und vergrabenen Geheimnissen hingezogen.
foreignData.name: Passionierter Archäologe
foreignData.text: Kommandeur-Kreaturen, die du besitzt, haben „Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch aus dem Exil wirkst, fügt diese Kreatur einem Gegner deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe des Manabetrags des Zauberspruchs zu."

foreignData.flavorText: Siempre sentiste una fascinación irrefrenable por las historias olvidadas y los secretos enterrados.
foreignData.name: Arqueólogo apasionado
foreignData.text: Las criaturas comandante de las cuales eres propietario tienen "Siempre que lances un hechizo desde el exilio, esta criatura hace una cantidad de daño igual al valor de maná de ese hechizo al oponente objetivo".

foreignData.flavorText: Impossible de vous rappeler une période où vous n'éprouviez pas de passion pour les histoires oubliées et les secrets enfouis.
foreignData.name: Archéologue passionné
foreignData.text: Les créatures Commandant que vous possédez ont « À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort depuis l'exil, cette créature inflige un nombre de blessures égal à la valeur de mana de ce sort à un adversaire ciblé. »

foreignData.flavorText: Non hai mai saputo resistere al richiamo delle storie dimenticate e dei segreti sepolti.
foreignData.name: Archeologo Appassionato
foreignData.text: Le creature comandante che possiedi hanno "Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia dall'esilio, questa creatura infligge a un avversario bersaglio danno pari al valore di mana di quella magia".

foreignData.flavorText: 失われた物語や埋もれた秘密に惹きつけられなかった日なんていつのことか思い出せない。
foreignData.name: 情熱的な考古学者
foreignData.text: あなたがオーナーである、統率者であるすべてのクリーチャーは「あなたが追放領域から呪文を唱えるたび、対戦相手１人を対象とする。このクリーチャーはそのプレイヤーに、その呪文のマナ総量に等しい点数のダメージを与える。」を持つ。
foreignData.type: 伝説のエンチャント — 背景

foreignData.flavorText: Histórias esquecidas e segredos enterrados fascinam você desde que você consegue se lembrar.
foreignData.name: Arqueólogo Dedicado
foreignData.text: As criaturas comandantes que você possui têm "Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica do exílio, esta criatura causa ao oponente alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao valor de mana daquela mágica".

foreignData.flavorText: Сколько вы себя помните, вас всегда тянуло к забытым историям и похороненным секретам.
foreignData.name: Страстный Археолог
foreignData.text: Принадлежащие вам существа-командиры имеют способность «Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание из изгнания, это существо наносит целевому оппоненту повреждения, равные мановой ценности того заклинания».

foreignData.flavorText: 你经常沉溺于遗忘故事与遭掩秘密之中难以自拔，已记不得尚持初心的时光。
foreignData.name: 热情考古家
foreignData.text: 由你拥有的指挥官生物具有「每当你从放逐区施放咒语时，此生物向目标对手造成伤害，其数量等同于该咒语的法术力值。」

foreignData.flavorText: 你經常沉溺於遺忘故事與遭掩秘密之中難以自拔，已記不得尚持初心的時光。
foreignData.name: 熱情考古家
foreignData.text: 由你擁有的指揮官生物具有「每當你從放逐區施放咒語時，此生物向目標對手造成傷害，其數量等同於該咒語的魔法力值。」

name: Passionate Archaeologist
originalText: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever you cast a spell from exile, this creature deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to target opponent."

rulings.text: Choose a Background is a variant of the partner ability. You may have two commanders if one of them is a legendary creature with the choose a background ability and the other is a legendary Background enchantment. Backgrounds and cards with choose a Background do not interact with cards which have any other partner ability.
If your Commander deck has two commanders, you can include only cards whose own color identities are also found in your commanders’ combined color identities.
Both commanders start in the command zone, and the remaining 98 cards (or 58 cards in a Commander Draft game) of your deck are shuffled to become your library.
If your commander loses the choose a Background ability or stops being a Background during the game, as appropriate, it is still your commander.

Once the game begins, your two commanders are tracked separately. If you cast one, you won’t have to pay an additional {2} the first time you cast the other. A player loses the game after having been dealt 21 combat damage from any one of them, not from both of them combined (although your Background won’t usually be a creature anyway).

If something refers to your commander while you have two commanders, it refers to one of them of your choice. If you are instructed to perform an action on your commander (e.g. put it from the command zone into your hand due to Command Beacon), you choose one of your commanders at the time the effect happens.
An effect that checks whether you control your commander is satisfied if you control one or both of your two commanders.
You can choose two commanders that are the same color or colors.

If a card refers to a commander creature you own, a Background won't usually be counted or included for that effect. If another spell or ability causes your Background to become a creature, however, it will be included. Any effect that refers to your commander or a commander you own or control without specifying creature will apply to a Background that is your commander, as appropriate.
If you control a Background that grants an ability to commander creatures you own, and you own more than one commander creature, each of them will have that ability.

text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever you cast a spell from exile, this creature deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to target opponent."
